SDK Installation¶

Gradle¶

To install the Infantium SDK v2 follow those steps:

  1. Inside Android Studio, edit the root build.gradle file
  2. Add the following dependency to the file
dependencies {
    ...
    compile 'org.infantium:sdkv2:1.0.0'
    ...
}

Unity Plugin¶

Download the .unitypackage plugin from <here> and open it. It will import .jar dependencies and C# code into your unity project.
